table_purpose: This table stores enriched financial ledger lines for the Foundation.
table_context: Each row in this table represents a single financial transaction line, including its associated account and amount.

columns.name: ledger_line_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for each financial ledger line.

columns.name: account_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The identifier of the account associated with this financial transaction line.

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for the financial transaction to which this line belongs.

columns.name: entry_date
columns.plain_english_definition: The date when this financial transaction entry was made.

columns.name: amount
columns.plain_english_definition: The monetary value of this financial transaction line.

table_purpose: This table records all financial deposits made to the foundation.
table_context: Each row in this table represents a single deposit transaction, including the user who made it, the amount deposited, and the method used.

columns.name: deposit_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for each deposit transaction.

columns.name: user_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The ID of the user who made the deposit.

columns.name: amount
columns.plain_english_definition: The amount of money deposited into the foundation's account.

columns.name: method
columns.plain_english_definition: The method used to make the deposit, such as online banking or check deposit.

columns.name: deposit_date
columns.plain_english_definition: The date and time when the deposit was made.

table_purpose: This table records all financial deposits made to the foundation.
table_context: Each row in this table represents a single deposit transaction, including the user who made it, the amount deposited, and the status of that deposit.

columns.name: deposit_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for each deposit transaction.

columns.name: user_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The ID of the user who made the deposit.

columns.name: amount
columns.plain_english_definition: The amount of money deposited into the foundation's account.

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for the financial transaction that recorded this deposit.

columns.name: status
columns.plain_english_definition: The current status of the deposit (e.g., pending, approved, rejected).

table_purpose: This table records all financial withdrawals made from the foundation.
table_context: Each row in this table represents a single withdrawal transaction, including the user who made it, the amount withdrawn, and the method used to withdraw the funds.

columns.name: withdrawal_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for each withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: user_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The ID of the user who made the withdrawal.

columns.name: amount
columns.plain_english_definition: The amount of money withdrawn in this transaction.

columns.name: withdrawal_date
columns.plain_english_definition: The date and time when the withdrawal was made.

columns.name: method
columns.plain_english_definition: The method used to withdraw the funds, such as check or electronic transfer.

table_purpose: This table stores information about financial withdrawals made from a foundation.
table_context: Each row in this table represents a single withdrawal transaction, including the user who made it, the amount withdrawn, and the status of that transaction.

columns.name: withdrawal_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for each withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: user_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The ID of the user who made the withdrawal.

columns.name: amount
columns.plain_english_definition: The amount of money withdrawn in the transaction.

columns.name: status
columns.plain_english_definition: The current status of the withdrawal transaction (e.g., approved, rejected, pending).

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for the financial transaction associated with this withdrawal.

table_purpose: This table stores the account balances for a given user and currency as of a specific date.
table_context: Each row in this table represents the balance of a single financial account for a specific user, on a specific date, and in a specific currency.

columns.name: account_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The unique identifier for the financial account.

columns.name: user_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The unique identifier for the user associated with this account balance.

columns.name: balance
columns.plain_english_definition: The amount of money in the account, expressed in the currency specified.

columns.name: as_of_date
columns.plain_english_definition: The date up to which the balance is valid.

columns.name: currency
columns.plain_english_definition: The currency in which the account balance is expressed.

table_purpose: This table stores raw data about financial transactions made through WorldPay.
table_context: Each row in this table represents a single transaction, including its unique identifier, type, amount, status, and user associated with the transaction.

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for each financial transaction made through WorldPay.

columns.name: transaction_type
columns.plain_english_definition: The type of the financial transaction, such as donation or purchase.

columns.name: amount
columns.plain_english_definition: The monetary value of the financial transaction.

columns.name: status
columns.plain_english_definition: The current status of the financial transaction, such as pending or completed.

columns.name: user_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The unique identifier for the user who initiated the financial transaction.

table_purpose: Records when a new session is created for an account in the Authgateway.
table_context: This table stores information about each time a new session is created for an account in the Authgateway. It includes details such as the session ID, user ID, success status, device type, and creation timestamp.

columns.name: session_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for the session.

columns.name: user_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The ID of the user associated with the session.

columns.name: success
columns.plain_english_definition: A boolean value indicating whether the session creation was successful or not.

columns.name: device_type
columns.plain_english_definition: The type of device used to create the session (e.g., mobile, desktop).

columns.name: created_at
columns.plain_english_definition: The date and time when the session was created.

table_purpose: Stores information about each attempt to verify an account on the Foundation platform.
table_context: Each row in this table represents a single verification attempt for a specific user, including the type of verification and its result.

columns.name: attempt_id
columns.plain_english_definition: A unique identifier for each verification attempt.

columns.name: user_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The ID of the user whose account was being verified during this attempt.

columns.name: verification_type
columns.plain_english_definition: The type of verification that was attempted, such as email or phone number.

columns.name: result
columns.plain_english_definition: Whether the verification attempt was successful or not.

columns.name: attempted_at
columns.plain_english_definition: The date and time when this verification attempt occurred.

table_purpose: This table stores the verified user details for each foundation account.
table_context: Each row in this table represents a single verified user detail record for a specific foundation account, including their verification level, country, and active status.

columns.name: user_id
columns.plain_english_definition: The unique identifier for the user associated with this verified user detail record.

columns.name: verification_level
columns.plain_english_definition: The level of verification that has been completed for this user, such as email or government ID verification.

columns.name: verified_date
columns.plain_english_definition: The date when the user's verification was completed.

columns.name: country
columns.plain_english_definition: The country where the user is located.

columns.name: active
columns.plain_english_definition: A flag indicating whether or not this user's account is currently active.
